articles.title: Slow vaccination, fast reopening: How Asia and Europe are fuelling surge in Covid-19's Delta variant - The Straits Times
articles.description: A surge in infections threatens to stall plans to gradually reopen Europe. Meanwhile, Indonesia and Malaysia are seeing record cases.. Read more at straitstimes.com.

articles.title: 1 million US COVID-19 vaccine doses due in Malaysia on Jul 5 - CNA
articles.description: WASHINGTON: One million donated doses of the COVID-19 vaccine developed by Pfizer and BioNTech will arrive in Malaysia on Monday (Jul 5), White House officials said, with plans for more shipments to Southeast Asia soon.
